name: Extraordinary: Monster
description:
"Extraordinary: Monster" is a point-and-click puzzle game created by TeatimeWorkshop
The story begins with E.I. senior investigator Karena tracking down a tragic murder case. The investigation in the abandoned Alberto laboratory made Karena feel that this was no ordinary murder case. Rare equipment, scratches on the wall, purple... Liquids, twisted animal cages... everything gradually points to the suspect-Professor Selon

Game features:
The operation and gameplay of the game are simple and easy to understand. Even if you have never played point-and-click puzzle games, you can easily get started.
The story in the game is presented in a unique picture book style, which will make you unable to put it down.
The puzzle design is rigorous and varied, supplemented by a variety of mini-games, making logic and fun coexist.
